Articles.Content:
Hi, guys!

I\'m aware that some of you have had problems downloading the game from our server. As we are working on a solution for that, I added two alternative links in the Download Page where you can try to download the game.

These links will remain there for downloading the Free Demo. For the paid version these links won\'t work, but it doesn\'t matter because for now only the demo version is available at the KSP Store. We\'ll keep working on this issue with our server, so it is solved for the next update.

Cheers.

Edited August 14, 2012 by aLeXmOrA
